lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.text: So today, we are excited to announce the launch of Critical Role Foundation! (cheering) (clapping) So it's a nonprofit organization with a mission statement that I'm sure some of you will recognize, to leave the world better than we found it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So am very excited to serve as the President of CRF, with Matt as our board member.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of a number, but the one here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And if we reach our goal of $50,000, Critical Role Foundation will be able to fund two nonprofits located at Zuni Pueblo and Cochiti Pueblo for an entire year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A long time. A long time coming.

lines.text: and some harsh truth from a Caduceus (laughs) to cap it off.
